name: Nidalee
title: the Bestial Huntress
lore: Raised in the deepest jungle, Nidalee is a master tracker who can shapeshift into a ferocious cougar at will. Neither wholly woman nor beast, she viciously defends her territory from any and all trespassers, with carefully placed traps and deft spear throws. She cripples her quarry before pouncing on them in feline form—the lucky few who survive tell tales of a wild woman with razor-sharp instincts, and even sharper claws...
blurb: Raised in the deepest jungle, Nidalee is a master tracker who can shapeshift into a ferocious cougar at will. Neither wholly woman nor beast, she viciously defends her territory from any and all trespassers, with carefully placed traps and deft spear...
allytips: Use brush to your advantage! Moving in and out of brush can heavily alter your effectiveness in battle.
Start team fights by harassing with your Javelin Toss, and then switch to cougar form to chase down Hunted targets.
Bushwhack traps deal damage based on their victim's current Health. Set them up in your team's backline before fights break out during sieges to help your team deal damage to the enemy frontline.
enemytips: Nidalee's Hunt debuff is only applied with Javelin Toss and Bushwhack. Avoiding being hit by these abilities will impair her ability to deal follow-up damage.
Nidalee's Javelin Toss deals more damage the farther she is. If she is far away, it's imperative to dodge it.
Nidalee's Takedown deals extreme damage to Hunted targets, but she has to get close to use it. Save your crowd control or defensive abilities for when she goes in for the kill.

riot_spell_q.name: Javelin Toss / Takedown
riot_spell_q.description: In human form, Nidalee throws a spiked javelin at her target that gains damage as it flies.  As a cougar, her next attack will attempt to fatally wound her target, dealing more damage the less life they have.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Human: Nidalee throws her javelin, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage. If it exceeds her basic attack range, it gains damage based on distance flown, up to a potential {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) total damage.

Cougar: Nidalee's next attack deals additional damage, greatly increased on low health targets.

riot_spell_w.name: Bushwhack / Pounce
riot_spell_w.description: In human form, Nidalee lays a trap for unwary opponents that, when sprung, damages and reveals its target. As a cougar, she jumps in a direction, dealing damage in an area where she lands.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Human: Nidalee places an invisible trap that lasts for 2 minutes. The trap triggers when an enemy walks over it, revealing the victim and bleeding them for {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage over 4 seconds.

{{ f4 }} traps may be active at once. (Maximum traps increases at level 6, 11 and 16)

Cougar: Nidalee lunges in target direction, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

riot_spell_e.name: Primal Surge / Swipe
riot_spell_e.description: In human form, Nidalee channels the spirit of the cougar to heal her allies and imbue them with Attack Speed for a short duration. As a cougar, she claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Human: Nidalee heals target ally champion for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f3 }}) based on their missing health and grants them {{ e4 }}% Attack Speed for 7 seconds.

Cougar: Nidalee claws at enemies in target direction.

riot_spell_r.name: Aspect Of The Cougar
riot_spell_r.description: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining new abilities.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Human: Nidalee transforms into a vicious cougar with the basic abilities Takedown, Pounce, and Swipe.

Cougar: Nidalee transforms back into human form. While in human form, triggering a Hunt resets the cooldown of Aspect of the Cougar.

riot_spell_i.name: Prowl
riot_spell_i.description:
Moving through brush increases Nidalee's Movement Speed by 10% for 2 seconds, increased to 30% toward visible enemy champions within 1400 range.

Hitting champions or monsters with Javelin Toss or Bushwhack triggers a Hunt, granting True Sight of them for 4 seconds. During this time, Nidalee gains 10% Movement Speed (increased to 30% toward the Hunted target) and her Takedown and Pounce are enhanced against them.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Prowl
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: Moving through brush increases Nidalee's Movement Speed by 10% for 2 seconds, increased to 30% toward visible enemy champions within 1400 range. Hitting champions or monsters with Javelin Toss or Bushwhack triggers a Hunt, granting True Sight of them for 4 seconds. During this time, Nidalee gains 10% Movement Speed (increased to 30% toward the Hunted target) and her Takedown and Pounce are enhanced against them.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate - Hunt:}} Hitting [[monster]]s or enemy champions with ''{{ai|Javelin Toss}}'' or ''{{ai|Bushwhack}}'' grants '''Prowl''' for 4 seconds and marks the target as '''Hunted''' for the same duration, granting {{tip|true sight|True Sight}} of them. Additionally, '''Nidalee's''' first use of ''{{ai|Takedown}}'' and ''{{ai|Pounce}}'' against '''Hunted''' targets are empowered. '''Prowl''' is also gained for 2 seconds while inside a {{tip|brush}}.
wikia_skill_i1.description2: {{sbc|Prowl:}} Grants '''Nidalee''' {{sti|ms|{{as|10% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, increased to {{as|30%|ms}} when facing a {{tt|nearby|1400 range}} [[Sight|visible]] enemy {{tip|champion}}.
wikia_skill_i1.notes: * Marked units outside ''Hunt's'' range will not be revealed.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Javelin Toss
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: In human form, Nidalee throws a spiked javelin at her target that gains damage as it flies.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee''' hurls a javelin forward in a line, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to the first enemy it hits, which is increased by {{pp|9|key=%|type=distance traveled|0|25|50|75|100|125|150|175|200|525|621.875|718.75|815.625|912.5|1009.375|1106.25|1203.125|1300|formula=0%{{plus}}(25% per 96.875 units traveled). ''This is capped at 200%. Damage ramps from 525 to 1300 units''}}.

wikia_skill_q2.name: Takedown
wikia_skill_q2.blurb: As a cougar, her next attack will attempt to fatally wound her target, dealing more damage the less life they have.
wikia_skill_q2.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee's''' next [[basic attack]] gains {{sti|range|75 '''bonus''' range}} and is modified to deal {{as|magic damage}}, increased by an amount for every {{as|1% of target's '''missing''' health}}.
wikia_skill_q2.description2: {{sbc|''{{ai|Prowl||Hunt}}'' Bonus:}} ''Takedown'' deals 40% increased damage to ''Hunted'' targets.
wikia_skill_q2.description3: ''Takedown'' resets '''Nidalee's''' autoattack timer. Other damage converted to magic damage by ''Takedown'' are not increased by ''Takedown's'' respective effects.
wikia_skill_q2.notes:
* ''Takedown'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Nidalee's'' previous orders.
* The attack enhanced by ''Takedown'' will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal (damage not increased by ''Takedown'') (magic damage to ''{{ai|Prowl||Hunted}}'' targets is displayed as such only for clarity reasons) as well as affect structures (will not deal bonus damage based on their '''missing''' health).
* Basic attacks enhanced by ''Takedown'' convert {{nie|Spellblade}} damage from {{ii|Sheen}}, {{ii|Iceborn Gauntlet}}, and/or {{ii|Trinity Force}} from physical to magic. Their damage is however not increased by ''Takedown''.
* ''Takedown's'' damage will apply {{sti|life steal}}.
* ''Takedown's'' enhanced attack cannot be {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}} but can be {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}}, {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}, and/or miss if ''Nidalee'' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Bushwhack
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: In human form, Nidalee lays a trap for unwary opponents that, when sprung, damages and reveals its target.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee''' lays a trap at the target location, which {{tip|Stealthed Trap|stealths}} and arms after a brief delay and lasts for up to 2 minutes. The next enemy who springs the trap takes {{as|magic damage}} over 4 seconds, granting {{tip|true sight|True Sight}} for the duration.
wikia_skill_w1.leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Second|{{ap|10 to 50}} {{as|(+ 5% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|10*4 to 50*4}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_w1.description2: Traps have {{as|{{sti|health|6 '''maximum''' health}}}} and can only be damaged by champion basic attacks (2 damage from {{tip|ranged}} and 3 from {{tip|melee}}). Up to a maximum of {{pp|4|4 to 10|1 to 16}} traps may be active at once.

wikia_skill_w2.name: Pounce
wikia_skill_w2.blurb: As a cougar, she jumps in a direction, dealing damage in an area where she lands.
wikia_skill_w2.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} a fixed distance in the direction of the cursor, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies around her landing point.
wikia_skill_w2.leveling: {{sbc|''{{ai|Pounce}}'' scales with ''{{ais|Aspect of the Cougar}}'' rank}}
wikia_skill_w2.description2: {{sbc|''{{ai|Prowl||Hunt}}'' Bonus:}} '''Nidalee''' can cursor-over ''Hunted'' enemies to ''Pounce'' on them from increased range.
wikia_skill_w2.description3: [[Kill]]ing a unit while in ''Cougar Form'' or using ''Pounce's'' ''Hunt'' bonus reduces ''Pounce's'' remaining {{sti|cooldown}} to a value. This has no effect if the remaining cooldown is already lower than that value.
wikia_skill_w2.notes:
* '''Pounce''' goes on cooldown on cast, and will not receive the reduced cooldown if the target becomes ''Hunted'' mid-air.
* {{Pending for test}} {{ci|Akali}} can still be affected by an enhanced ''{{ai|Pounce}}'' during her {{ai|Twilight Shroud|Akali}}.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Primal Surge
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: In human form, Nidalee channels the spirit of the cougar to heal her allies and imbue them with Attack Speed for a short duration.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee''' evokes the spirit of the cougar, {{tip|healing}} the target allied champion or herself, increased by {{as|{{pp|11|label1=target's '''missing''' health|label2=Heal increase|key=%|0 to 100|key1=%|0 to 100|displayformula=1% per 1% of target's '''missing''' health}}|health}}, and granting them {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 7 seconds.
wikia_skill_e1.leveling:
{{st|Minimum Heal|{{ap|35 to 115}} {{as|(+ {{fd|32.5}}% AP)}}|Maximum Heal|{{ap|35*2 to 115*2}} {{as|(+ 65% AP)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Bonus Attack Speed|{{ap|20 to 60}}%}}
wikia_skill_e1.notes: * The bonus attack speed will persist through ''{{ai|Aspect of the Cougar 2||Cougar Form}}'' if '''Nidalee''' uses ''{{ai|Primal Surge}}'' on herself.

wikia_skill_e2.name: Swipe
wikia_skill_e2.blurb: As a cougar, she claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her.
wikia_skill_e2.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee''' claws at enemies in an arc in the direction of the cursor, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit.
wikia_skill_e2.leveling:
{{sbc|''{{ai|Swipe}}'' scales with ''{{ais|Aspect of the Cougar}}'' rank}}
{{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|70 to 250 4}} {{as|(+ 45% AP)}}}}

wikia_skill_r1.name: Aspect of the Cougar
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining new abilities.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee''' transforms herself into a cougar, gaining {{tip|melee}} attacks with {{sti|range|125 range}} as well as new [[Champion ability|abilities]].
wikia_skill_r1.leveling: {{sbc|Cougar form's abilities rank up when ''{{ai|Aspect of the Cougar}}'' does}}
wikia_skill_r1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee''' transforms herself into a human, gaining {{tip|ranged}} attacks with 525 {{sti|range}} as well as new [[Champion ability|abilities]].
wikia_skill_r1.description3: Triggering ''{{ai|Prowl||Hunt}}'' resets ''Aspect of the Cougar's'' {{sti|cooldown}} if '''Nidalee''' is in human form.
wikia_skill_r1.description4: '''Nidalee''' begins with one rank in ''Aspect of the Cougar'' and can increase it at levels 6, 11, and 16.

wikia_champ.title: the Bestial Huntress
wikia_champ.skill_r: Aspect of the Cougar;Aspect of the Cougar 2
